title: Skin for Orange Essence
body: I have a legendary skin and it requires a lot of orange essence. So, whenever I have got a skin shard I sell them for orange essence. But I recently got a poppy skin. Since I already own the champion, the skin was activated automatically. I cannot sell that for orange essence. Is there anyway I am able to do that?

replies.body: The Lollipoppy skin you got was permanent because you rerolled 3 skin shards. This is normal and worked correctly. Rerolled skin shards are automatically redeemed and added to your collection.
